title: Bug 124067 - Relative Path Not Supported When Selecting XML File
description: When selecting an XML file, the relative path should be supported.
OB: When selecting the XML file, only the absolute path is supported.
EB: When selecting the XML file, both relative and absolute paths should be supported.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the file selection menu.
3. Select an XML file using a relative path.
4. Observe that only the absolute path is supported.
